links.description: Respect the block trades. Options analysts like to look at block trades to see where the action is happening. Usually very big trades are executed by traders with abundant capital. Of course, lots of capital usually means access to copious amounts of research as well.

links.title: 25 Unstoppable Stocks to Buy No Matter What
links.description: There is a lot of noise in the stock market when hunting for stocks to buy. Every day, discrete events send stocks up and down. These discrete events can be company-specific, like earnings reports, murmurs about mergers and acquisitions, analyst upgrades and downgrades, or investor presentations.

links.title: $AAPL The Bullish Option Trade After an Earnings Rip in Apple Inc
links.description: If you've ever seen a stop rip off of earnings and wondered if that was a signal for a trade, or if the momentum would continue, then this is exactly the back-test you are after. We call it "star gazing" when a stock rips and we're stuck -- with no idea what to expect next.
